meanings.definition: Near in space, time, or relation.
meanings.sent1: The end of the road is nigh, just around the corner.
meanings.sent2: The nigh tree provided shade on hot days.
meanings.sent3: The nigh squirrel always stole nuts from the same tree.
meanings.sent4: The nigh deadline loomed over the students like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: The nigh storm threatened to drench the picnic attendees.

meanings.sent1: The cake was nigh perfect, just a bit too sweet.
meanings.sent2: She was nigh ready to leave for the party.
meanings.sent3: The nigh empty jar held only a few cookies.
meanings.sent4: The nigh full moon cast a soft glow over the quiet town.
meanings.sent5: The nigh finished puzzle was missing just one piece.

meanings.sent1: The nigh storm clouds darkened the sky.
meanings.sent2: The nigh train whistle signaled its imminent arrival.
meanings.sent3: The nigh birthday party excited the children.
meanings.sent4: The nigh footsteps echoed in the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The nigh end of the school year brought both relief and sadness.
